Inrupt Client Libraries

  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
com.inrupt.client

  • Packages that use com.inrupt.client 
    Package Description
    com.inrupt.client
    Application interfaces for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.auth
    Authentication and Authorization classes for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.core
    Core classes and utilities for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.httpclient
    HttpClient bindings for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.jena
    Jena RDF support for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.okhttp
    OkHttp bindings for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.openid
    OpenID support for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.rdf4j
    RDF4J RDF support for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.solid
    Support for Solid specific concepts for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.spi
    Service interfaces for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.uma
    User Managed Access support for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.util
    Utility classes for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.webid
    WebID Profile support for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
  • Classes in com.inrupt.client used by com.inrupt.client 
    Class Description
    Client
    An API for a HTTP client.
    Client.Builder
    An API for a HTTP client builder.
    Headers
    A read-only view of a collection of HTTP headers.
    Headers.Link
    A class for representing an HTTP Link header.
    Headers.WacAllow
    a class for parsing WAC-allow headers.
    Headers.WwwAuthenticate
    Part of the HTTP Challenge and Response authentication framework, this class represents a challenge object as represented in a WWW-Authenticate Response Header.
    Request
    An HTTP Request.
    Request.BodyPublisher
    An API for serializing an HTTP Request.
    Request.Builder
    A Request builder.
    Response
    An HTTP Response.
    Response.BodyHandler
    An interface for mapping an HTTP response into a specific Java type.
    Response.ResponseInfo
    Initial response info supplied to a Response.BodyHandler before the body is processed.
    ValidationResult  
  • Classes in com.inrupt.client used by com.inrupt.client.auth 
    Class Description
    Request
    An HTTP Request.
